postSQLs:['delete from Raw_Twitter where 
date in (select distinct date from Temp_Raw_Twitter where date is not null)','insert Raw_Twitter
select * from Temp_Raw_Twitter;','delete from Changemakers_Combined_Overview where sub_channel = 'Twitter';','insert into Changemakers_Combined_Overview (channel,sub_channel,date, month, month_year, week, day_week, week_type, time_day, impression_by_date, users_by_date, activity_calendar_events, event_occurence_by_date, event_occurence_by_time, activity_implemented_by, likes_consid_engage_by_date, shares_by_date, comments_by_date, follows_by_date, total_engagements, conversion_total_clicks, conversion_listened_watched, listened_watched_full_podcast_episode)
  select
    'Social Media' as 'channel'
    ,'Twitter' as 'sub_channel'
          , date as date
        , datename(month, date) as month
        , concat(datename(month, date), ' ', year(date)) as month_year
        , concat(datename(month, date), ' ', year(date), ' Week ', (DATEPART(week, date) - DATEPART(week, DATEADD(day, 1, EOMONTH(date, -1)))) + 1) as week
        , datename(dw, date) as day_week
        , case when datename(dw, date) in ('Saturday', 'Sunday') then 'Weekend' else 'Weekday' end as week_type
        , 'Unspecified' as time_day
    , impressions as impression_by_date
    , impressions as users_by_date
    , tweets_published as activity_calendar_events
    , date as event_occurence_by_date
    , date as event_occurence_by_time
    , 'Janet Guest' as activity_implemented_by
    , likes as likes_consid_engage_by_date
    , retweets as shares_by_date
    , replies as comments_by_date
    , follows as follows_by_date
    , (likes + retweets + replies + follows + user_profile_clicks + url_clicks + hashtag_clicks)  as total_engagements
    , (user_profile_clicks + url_clicks + hashtag_clicks + detail_expands + permalink_clicks + app_opens + app_installs) as conversion_total_clicks
--    , case when impressions = 0 then 0 else cast((user_profile_clicks + url_clicks + hashtag_clicks + detail_expands + permalink_clicks + app_opens + app_installs) as decimal) / cast(impressions as decimal) * 100 end as click_through_rate
    , media_views as conversion_listened_watched
    , media_views as listened_watched_full_podcast_episode
--    , case when impressions = 0 then 0 else (cast(media_views as decimal) / cast(impressions as decimal) * 100) end as video_view_rate
--    , case when impressions = 0 then 0 else (cast(media_views as decimal) / cast(impressions as decimal) * 100) end as video_completion_rate
from Raw_Twitter;','drop table if exists Temp_Raw_Twitter;'],
